page.title: 04CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: We found interesting facts about the differences in the{games}children play when they go from primary to high school e.g.In high school almost all {outdoor}games were sports. In primary most{outdoor}games were playground games.There was a wide variety of {computers}in high school but not in primary e.g. M.S.X., commodore and spectrum etc.The most widely played games were the arcade type.The most common board game was Monopoly. Most common{indoor}game is Snooker & Pool in the two oldest age groups; in the two youngest age groups however they prefer Hide & seek.{Travelling}games are not very common; most people read. From the few answers Cards were most popular.Some games like who stole my pencil are traditional primary games. One person exits the classroom and his pencil is hidden.He has to find it.
